meanings.sent2: The playground is for nonadults only.
meanings.sent3: The nonadults had a secret meeting in the treehouse.
meanings.sent4: In the land of imagination, nonadults rule the kingdom.
meanings.sent5: The nonadults giggled and played in the park all day.

meanings.definition: Those who have not reached the age of majority.
meanings.sent1: Nonadults need permission from their parents to sign contracts.
meanings.sent2: The movie theater offers discounts for nonadults.
meanings.sent3: The nonadults tried to sneak into the R-rated movie.
meanings.sent4: In the world of grown-ups, nonadults are seen as curious creatures.
meanings.sent5: The nonadults eagerly awaited their turn on the roller coaster.
